name: places/ChIJhZHHBsdZwokRZPDm5NG-DzA
formattedAddress: 1058 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1058 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: This store is absolutely amazing. I think the service is great, especially Taylor, who is lovely as can be and able to put this clothing line together is such a beautiful and edgy way. I go in frequently with my daughter, and I am not a wealthy upper east sider. I think some of the girls who work here may be on the quiet side due to work experience, etc. However, they are all sweet and helpful. I have never encountered anything but kind, respectful, and good service. I do think that Taylor goes above and beyond, and is the role model for how the clothes can be worn, and who the rest of the staff should follow regarding management style, people skills, etc. I love going into this store as it has such a beautiful and happy vibe and the clothes are exquisite.

originalText.text: I would give a zero star if I could! Please be mindful when ordering online! Contact both shop and FedEx no one could help me solve the problem. Yes, I am that unhappy customer and I will never shop or support anything from your business again.

text.text: I would give a zero star if I could! Please be mindful when ordering online! Contact both shop and FedEx no one could help me solve the problem. Yes, I am that unhappy customer and I will never shop or support anything from your business again.

originalText.text: The clothes and accessories are amazing! Coming from stl which does not have a LFS location I was really excited to shop here but the customer service was extremely disappointing!!! The sales assistants couldn’t be less interested in helping as the whole time they were on their phones and trying on merchandise. I was not once offered a dressing room or even asked if I needed help finding the correct sizes!

originalText.text:
Do you see the beautiful decoration in this all pink window? That is love shack fancy boutique. It is on Madison Avenue in New York City and I happen to be passing there during my lunch break and I stopped in my tracks because although I have seen this window before, but it was never to me this beautiful. There were two women outside looking into the window which overwhelmed me with Joy. I said to the women “what a beautiful window“ and they said “it is beautiful isn’t it”. So after another look at the window, I walk, just passed the door of the store, and this woman that I had seen beckon for me to come in, I stepped into the store. It was not my first time being at the store I had just visited about two weeks ago. And once the woman signal for me to come in, I came in .oh my goodness this room is so beautiful And all of these beautiful girls were there dressed in pink. the same woman that I had met outside, said to me, do you like it and I said I love it and she said do you think people like this place. I said “what are you talking about“ have you ever shopped here before this is absolutely beautiful. Why wouldn’t you like it?” and I was not embarrassed because it just came out so quickly that the other woman that was with her said  “this is the owner and her name is Rebecca” and I was like “OK but you shouldn’t have to ask that question. I’m sure you know the people love it because I have a young lady that I know who loves being here with her friends”.

And out of all this came these pictures and she suggested that I take a picture and SHE took the picture.
She is so beautiful and so kind she deserves everything that she has. She has beautiful young girls working with her. They are kind.  She keeps a very nice store. I must say that it is high end but you won’t see anyone looking like you.
I suggest that you go by her store and I’m not going to say that she’s going to be there, but go by the store, go in and buy up thousands of dollars worth of stuff !!!it’s well stocked elegance,you’re gonna love it.
Everyone in that store has manners and they are happy. It’s beautiful in there please go see her.
Thank you so much.

Enjoy yourself

Happy PINK Holiday’s

Be kind to mankind

LoveShackFancy
1058 Madison Ave
10028

originalText.text: The store is beautiful and has incredible clothes and accessories. Unfortunately their service couldn't be worse, be prepared for them not to say hello and completely ignore you unless you are an upper east resident. Their employees are super classist. Seeing that no one showed any intention of helping me choose a dress for my daughter, I left. I don't recommend a place like that.very classist place. I don’t understand why with so many negative reviews, the company don’t take action. Another lost costumer.
